Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill, you can now interact with your Neo devices by voice, without the use of the remote control. 
To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Neo.io account and discover your devices. 
When using the skill, you need to establish names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:
- Use the names you have set up already. These are shown in the Alexa app and can be changed.
- Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. 
More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups-uk)
After you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:
To turn on:
"Alexa, turn on Neo."
To change the channel:
"Alexa, change the channel on Neo to Slovenia 1."
"Alexa, change the channel to number 12 on Neo."
"Alexa, next channel."
To control playback:
"Alexa, play from the start in the living room NEO."
"Alexa, pause."
"Alexa, fast forward."
To change volume:
"Alexa, mute NEO."
"Alexa, volume 10.
"Alexa, lower volume"
For more information about setting up Alexa and linking Neo Smartlife skill and the NEO Smartbox, visit https://www.telekom.si/pomoc-in-podpora/teme-pomoci/televizija/neo.
